title: PATCH 7.5 ERROR
body: EVERYTIME THE CLIENT GOES TO AROUND 40% it comes up with error: "unspecified error occured. Please check the logs for more info". CAN SOMEONE PLEASE EXPLAING TO ME WHAT I HAVE TO DO. I HAVE DOWNLOADED THE HEXTECH REPAIR TOOL AND STILL IT DOESNT WORK @RIOTSUPPORT

replies.body:
At this period during the patcher, your network is trying to maintain a connection with our patching servers in order to download updates.  You may have an unstable connection that's cutting off and failing to continue with that.  

Go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)  guide to get your connection and settings in order to continue the update.  The only exception would be if you have the Webroot Secure Anywhere antivirus, and in that case you will need to make sure it's allowing league as an exception.  I hope that helps!
